## Useful Info

An **iron devil** is a [tier-4 demon](/Tier-4_demon "Tier-4 demon") with decent [AC](/AC "AC") and multiple resistances. It's as slow as a naga and it can't swim, so escaping isn't difficult. If you do choose to face them head on, they may be a threat to low-level characters, as they tend to wield heavy weapons. They normally appear in [the Abyss](/The_Abyss "The Abyss"), [Pandemonium](/Pandemonium "Pandemonium"), and the [Hells](/Hell "Hell") (especially [the Iron City of Dis](/The_Iron_City_of_Dis "The Iron City of Dis")), but can also appear in [vaults](/Vault "Vault") in the early [Dungeon](/Dungeon "Dungeon") (safely locked away, of course).

## Tips & Tricks

If you're in Hell, you can pretty much ignore these. If you worship [the Shining One](/The_Shining_One "The Shining One") or [Makhleb](/Makhleb "Makhleb"), kill them for the healing. If you do find one in the early dungeon due to a vault, you're unlikely to be able to kill it due to its [AC](/AC "AC") and resistances, so just walk away.

## History

In [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), iron devils were replaced with [rust devils](/Rust_devil "Rust devil").

Prior to [0.15](/0.15 "0.15"), iron devils did not come armed, and were significantly less threatening.

A hideous humanoid figure with metal skin. While it lacks magical attacks and is slow of foot, it makes up for these failings with brute strength.

Useful Info

An iron devil is a tier-4 demon with decent AC and multiple resistances. It's as slow as a naga and it can't swim, so escaping isn't difficult. If you do choose to face them head on, they may be a threat to low-level characters, as they tend to wield heavy weapons. They normally appear in the Abyss, Pandemonium, and the Hells (especially the Iron City of Dis), but can also appear in vaults in the early Dungeon (safely locked away, of course).

Tips & Tricks

If you're in Hell, you can pretty much ignore these. If you worship the Shining One or Makhleb, kill them for the healing. If you do find one in the early dungeon due to a vault, you're unlikely to be able to kill it due to its AC and resistances, so just walk away.

History

In 0.16, iron devils were replaced with rust devils.

Prior to 0.15, iron devils did not come armed, and were significantly less threatening.
